item.title: Google Chrome 139 — Update Now Warning Issued For 3.5 Billion Users
item.description: Google has confirmed the release of Chrome 139 — update now, as multiple browser security vulnerabilities are also corroborated.

item.title: Exactly When Apple Will Reveal Its iPhone 17 Special Event

item.title: Brazil’s Hidden Hotspot For Silky Sharks Could Be A Lifeline
item.description: A surprise sighting of hundreds of endangered silky sharks may help map key aggregation sites vital for their survival.

item.title: Obamacare Insurer Oscar Health, Hit By Higher Costs, Sees 2026 Rebound
item.description: Oscar Health reported a $228 million second quarter loss but sees profits returning next year as the health insurance industry navigates an influx of ...

item.title: Uranus Is Warmer Then We Thought, NASA Says
item.description: NASA and Oxford researchers have found that Uranus emits more heat than expected, making it less of an outlier in the solar system than once thought.
